anomalies.description: HS code 84713000 does not match 'Cotton T-shirts 100% knitted'. The product is knitted clothing (T-shirts), which falls under Chapter 61, not Chapter 84 (Machinery, computers). The correct HS code for knitted cotton T-shirts is 61091000.

evidence.correct_chapter: 61 - Articles Of Apparel And Clothing Accessories, Knitted Or Crocheted
evidence.llm_reason: The product is knitted clothing (T-shirts), which falls under Chapter 61, not Chapter 84 (Machinery, computers). The correct HS code for knitted cotton T-shirts is 61091000.

anomalies.recommendation: Re-classify under correct HS chapter: 61 - Articles Of Apparel And Clothing Accessories, Knitted Or Crocheted. File amendment with customs. Penalty: ₹50K-₹2L.
anomalies.detection_method: LLM: Gemini 1.5 Flash HS classification check

anomalies.description: FOB mismatch: reported $10,800.00 != calculated $9,000.00
anomalies.recommendation: Verify invoice with buyer. Correct FOB before drawback claim submission.
anomalies.detection_method: Rule-based arithmetic/logic check

anomalies.description: Drawback of $850.00 claimed but customs_status is REJECTED.
anomalies.recommendation: Reverse drawback claim immediately. File amendment with DGFT.
anomalies.detection_method: Rule-based arithmetic/logic check

anomalies.description: Cotton T-shirts 100% knitted: unit_price $0.80 is 3.1σ LOW from mean $4.44.
anomalies.recommendation: Review pricing with Gulf Distributors LLC. Check for under/over-invoicing.
anomalies.detection_method: Z-score (threshold=2.5)

anomalies.description: Freight cost $7,200 for INMUN1→DEHAM (40ft) is 3.0σ HIGH from route avg $2,258.
anomalies.recommendation: Verify with freight forwarder. Get 2 competitive quotes. Check for kickback arrangements.
anomalies.detection_method: Z-score (threshold=2.5)

anomalies.description: Route INMUN1→AEJEA: transit 45 days is 5.3σ from route mean 10 days.
anomalies.recommendation: Contact freight forwarder. Verify vessel tracking. Check for detention/demurrage.
anomalies.detection_method: Z-score (threshold=2.5)

anomalies.description: Incoterm is CIF (seller pays freight) but freight_cost_usd = 0.
anomalies.recommendation: Check if freight was invoiced separately. Update freight_cost_usd or change incoterm.
anomalies.detection_method: Rule-based arithmetic/logic check
